version_description:
Bank easy, bank on-the-go with the all new BDO Personal Mobile Banking!

Scheduled Transactions
Schedule, edit, cancel, and view status of bills payment, fund transfer, and prepaid mobile reload transactions

Enhanced Credit Card Features
Pay bills via credit card, register for electronic billing statement and view monthly statement of account

Wider Functionalities
View inbox, monitor trust accounts, reorder checkbook, and stop payment order

Send Money

To an unenrolled BDO account: Transfer funds to any BDO deposit account with no enrollment required

To a paycode: Transfer funds to any BDO deposit account by using the receiver’s paycode (E-Mail or mobile number)

Cash Card Reload

Reload Cash Card: Transfer funds from own enrolled accounts (Current, Savings and Cash Card) to any enrolled Cash Card

Reload Wallet: Transfer funds from own enrolled accounts (Current, Savings and Cash Card) to any enrolled
Cash Card with Wallet

Fixes and updates for an enhanced mobile banking experience

version_name: 9.0Inquire points balance of BDO Rewards CardView Home

version_description:
Now supports iOS Version 9.0
Inquire points balance of BDO Rewards Card
View Home, Auto and Small Business Loan account balances
View balances without login using Quick Balance. Now with expiry options.
Now you can generate your own One Time Password (OTP) for BDO Online Banking login and Send Money
transactions. No more waiting for SMS/Text.

Now supports iOS Version 9.0
Inquire points balance of BDO Rewards Card
View Home, Auto and Small Business Loan account balances
View balances without login using Quick Balance. Now with expiry options.
Now you can generate your own One Time Password (OTP) for BDO Online Banking login and Send Money
transactions. No more waiting for SMS/Text.

Enjoy more options to Send Money to anyone! Remit allowances via door-to-door, for cash pick-up, or credit to another local bank.
Simply accomplish remittance details through your Online Banking account. Your saved templates will be accessible in Mobile
Banking.
Quick Balance for BDO Credit Card now displays the Available Credit Limit instead of Outstanding Balance

1. Enrollment
Enroll additional own or another person's account. Add new billers for payment and mobile number for reload.
2. Profile Update
Update registered mobile number and e-Mail address
3. Quick Action (Menu)
Access financial transactions directly from a selected account. Transfer Funds (Send Money), Pay Bills, or Reload Mobile quickly
and conveniently!
4. iOS Update Support
Supports iOS10

1. Trust Account viewing

3. Supports Add from Contacts using iOS10

Fingerprint Authentication for Login

- Login with a touch of a finger tip! Subscribe via the settings of the mobile app to activate
- Service is available for all iOS and Android fingerprint authentication ready mobile services

Password Peek (Show/Hide)

Allows users to quickly and easily check previously typed hidden text in the password field

Rewards Enhancement

Now displays details of supplementary card/s of principal BDO Rewards card member
